page.title: 07Factory Hours, Fraserburgh
page.content: My father is an{engineer}at a{fish {factory}in Watermill Road.It is called International Fish Canners and is a Norweigen owned firm which mostly cans {sprats and mackrel. It employs about 150 people, most of whom are women working on either {day shift}from 7.30a.m.till 5.00p.m. or an{evening shift}from 5.30p.m. till 9.30a.m.The men employed on production at the factory work two shifts.The {morning shift}starts at 6.00a.m.and finishes at 6.00p.m.The evening shift starts at 6.00p.m.and finishes at 6.00a.m.Production stops at 9.30.p.m. so the men employed in the evening shift have from 9.30p.m.till 6.00a.m. to clean the machines and the factory ready for the next days production. { GLENN GIBSON}(14) ____________________
